targets.queryText: SELECT as_of_date_local AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT as_of_date_local AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT market_value AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT market_value AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT projected_monthly_income AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT projected_monthly_income AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT goal_progress_pct AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT goal_progress_pct AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT ltv_pct AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT ltv_pct AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT drawdown_depth_pct AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT drawdown_depth_pct AS value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, market_value AS "Market Value" FROM daily_portfolio WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, market_value AS "Market Value" FROM daily_portfolio WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, projected_monthly_income AS "Projected", goal_target_monthly_income AS "Target" FROM daily_portfolio WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, projected_monthly_income AS "Projected", goal_target_monthly_income AS "Target" FROM daily_portfolio WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-180 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: SELECT symbol, weight_pct, market_value, projected_monthly_dividend FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_holdings) ORDER BY weight_pct DESC LIMIT 6;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT symbol, weight_pct, market_value, projected_monthly_dividend FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_holdings) ORDER BY weight_pct DESC LIMIT 6;

targets.queryText: SELECT symbol, ex_date_est, pay_date_est, amount_est FROM daily_dividends_upcoming WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_dividends_upcoming) ORDER BY pay_date_est LIMIT 6;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT symbol, ex_date_est, pay_date_est, amount_est FROM daily_dividends_upcoming WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_dividends_upcoming) ORDER BY pay_date_est LIMIT 6;

targets.queryText: SELECT CASE period_type WHEN 'WEEK' THEN 'WTD' WHEN 'MONTH' THEN 'MTD' WHEN 'QUARTER' THEN 'QTD' WHEN 'YEAR' THEN 'YTD' END AS period, mv_delta, monthly_income_delta, twr_period_pct FROM period_summary WHERE period_type IN ('WEEK','MONTH','QUARTER','YEAR') AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY CASE period_type WHEN 'WEEK' THEN 1 WHEN 'MONTH' THEN 2 WHEN 'QUARTER' THEN 3 WHEN 'YEAR' THEN 4 END;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CASE period_type WHEN 'WEEK' THEN 'WTD' WHEN 'MONTH' THEN 'MTD' WHEN 'QUARTER' THEN 'QTD' WHEN 'YEAR' THEN 'YTD' END AS period, mv_delta, monthly_income_delta, twr_period_pct FROM period_summary WHERE period_type IN ('WEEK','MONTH','QUARTER','YEAR') AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY CASE period_type WHEN 'WEEK' THEN 1 WHEN 'MONTH' THEN 2 WHEN 'QUARTER' THEN 3 WHEN 'YEAR' THEN 4 END;
